query.sfwSql: SELECT count(*) RequestCount, ISNULL(CAST(sum(cast(TIME_IN_MS AS decimal(10, 0))/1000)/COUNT_BIG(*) AS decimal(10, 2)), 0.00) AverageResponseTime, ISNULL(sum(case when STATUS_VALUE = 'ERR' then 1 else 0 end), 0) ErrorCount, ISNULL(sum(case when STATUS_VALUE = 'SLOW' OR STATUS_VALUE = 'VSLO' then 1 else 0 end), 0) SlowCount, round(cast(count(*) AS float) / case when DateDiff(MINUTE, min(start_time), max(start_time)) = 0 then 1 else DateDiff(MINUTE, min(start_time), max(start_time)) end, 2) Throughput , count(distinct web_server_name) AS WebServerCount, @START_TIME START_TIME, @END_TIME END_TIME FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn with(nolock) WHERE start_time between @START_TIME AND @END_TIME AND web_server_name is not null

SELECT count(IAD.INST_ACTN_DTL_ID) REQUEST_COUNT, ISNULL(cast(sum(cast(IAD.TIME_IN_MS AS decimal(10, 0))/1000)/COUNT_BIG(*) AS decimal(10, 2)), 0.0) AverageResponseTime, ISNULL(sum(case when IAD.STATUS_VALUE = 'ERR' then 1 else 0 end), 0) ErrorCount, ISNULL(sum(case when IAD.STATUS_VALUE = 'SLOW' OR IAD.STATUS_VALUE = 'VSLO' then 1 else 0 end), 0) SlowCount, round(cast(count(*) AS float) / case when DateDiff(MINUTE, min(IAD.START_TIME), max(IAD.START_TIME)) = 0 then 1 else DateDiff(MINUTE, min(IAD.START_TIME), max(IAD.START_TIME)) end, 2) Throughput, count(distinct IA.APPSERVER_NAME) AS AppServerCount, @START_TIME START_TIME, @END_TIME END_TIME
FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_DTL IAD with(nolock) INNER JOIN SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN IA WITH(NOLOCK) ON IAD.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID = IA.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID WHERE IAD.START_TIME between @START_TIME AND @END_TIME

select * from (select count(*) ActiveSession from sys.sysprocesses with(nolock) where dbid = DB_ID() and spid> 52 and dbid>0 and len(hostname) > 0) as T1 , (select CAST((mem.available_physical_memory_kb/(mem.total_physical_memory_kb*1.0)*100) as decimal(10,2)) Per_MemoryFree , (mem.total_physical_memory_kb/1024) AS TotalAvailableMemory from sys.dm_os_sys_memory mem with(nolock)) as t2, (select count(*) as ActiveRequests from sys.dm_exec_requests with(nolock) where session_id > 50 and status <> 'background' and status = 'running' AND database_id = DB_ID()) as t3, (select count(*) as blockcount from sys.sysprocesses with(nolock) where blocked > 0 and dbid = DB_ID() and spid > 52) as t4

SELECT * FROM (SELECT 10 AS 'TodaysClaims') T0, (SELECT 10 AS 'WeeklyClaims') T1, (select count(SESSION_ID) as SESS_ROW from SGS_SESSION_STORE WITH(NOLOCK)) as T2, (SELECT COUNT(*) as AppCount FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_APP WITH(NOLOCK)) as T3

SELECT TOP 5 COUNT(EXCEPTION_INSTANCE_ID) AS [EXCEPTIONS], FORM_NAME, EXCEPTION_MESSAGE, @START_TIME START_TIME, @END_TIME END_TIME FROM SGS_EXCEPTION_LOG WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE (EXCEPTION_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME) GROUP BY FORM_NAME, EXCEPTION_MESSAGE ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT TOP 5 QUE.QUERY_REF, QUE.QUERY, MAX(DTL.TIME_IN_MS) AS TIME_IN_MS, @START_TIME START_TIME, @END_TIME END_TIME FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_DTL DTL WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGS_UNIQUE_QUERY QUE WITH(NOLOCK) ON DTL.UNIQUE_QUERY_ID = QUE.UNIQUE_QUERY_ID WHERE DTL_TYPE_VALUE = 'QURY' AND (DTL.STATUS_VALUE = 'SLOW' OR DTL.STATUS_VALUE = 'VSLO') AND (DTL.START_TIME between @START_TIME AND @END_TIME) GROUP BY QUE.QUERY_REF, QUE.QUERY ORDER BY 3 DESC

SELECT IIF(COUNT([CANC]) = 0, 0, SUM([CANC])) [CANC], IIF(COUNT([QUED]) = 0, 0, SUM([QUED])) [QUED], IIF(COUNT([PRER]) = 0, 0, SUM([PRER])) [PRER], IIF(COUNT([PRCS]) = 0, 0, SUM([PRCS])) [PRCS], IIF(COUNT([PRSU]) = 0, 0, SUM([PRSU])) [PRSU] FROM (select jd.STATUS_VALUE from sgs_job_detail jd with(nolock) inner join SGS_CODE_VALUE cv with(nolock) on jd.STATUS_VALUE = cv.CODE_VALUE and jd.STATUS_ID = cv.CODE_ID where jd.START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time ) T PIVOT( count(STATUS_VALUE) FOR STATUS_VALUE IN ([CANC],[PRCS],[PRER],[PRSU],[QUED]) ) as pivottable;

SELECT IIF(COUNT(Request) =0, 0, SUM(Request)) as Request, IIF(COUNT(Queue) =0, 0, SUM(Queue)) as Queue, IIF(COUNT(ErrorCount) =0, 0, SUM(ErrorCount)) as ErrorCount FROM ( select case when action_type = 'BpmRequestsHandler' then 'Request' when ACTION_TYPE ='Dequeue' then 'Queue' else action_type end as action_type , count(*) as NoOfItems from SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN with(nolock) where START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time and action_type in ('BpmRequestsHandler','Dequeue') group by ACTION_TYPE ) AS T PIVOT ( sum(NoOfItems) FOR action_type IN ([Request],[Queue],[ErrorCount]) )as pivottable;

SELECT TOP 1 * FROM (SELECT TOP 1 ALA.ACT_LOG_APP_ID, ALA.APP_NAME, COUNT(ALI.IP_ADDRESS) AS INVALID_LOGIN_ATTEMPT FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN LIA with(nolock) INNER JOIN SGS_ACT_LOG_INST ALI with(nolock) ON LIA.ACT_LOG_INST_ID = ALI.ACT_LOG_INST_ID INNER JOIN SGS_ACT_LOG_APP ALA with(nolock) ON ALA.ACT_LOG_APP_ID = ALI.ACT_LOG_APP_ID WHERE LIA.NAME = 'InvalidLoginAttempt' AND LIA.RESULT = 'InvalidLoginAttempt' AND LIA.START_TIME BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time GROUP BY ALA.APP_NAME, ALA.ACT_LOG_APP_ID UNION (SELECT -1, 'All', 0)) T ORDER BY 3 DESC

SELECT DATEADD(MINUTE,ROUND(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, 0, DTL.START_TIME) / 1.0,0) * 1,0) START_TIME, AVG(DTL.TIME_IN_MS) TIME_IN_MS FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_DTL DTL WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN ACTN WITH(NOLOCK) ON DTL.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID = ACTN.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID WHERE DTL.START_TIME BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME AND DTL.DTL_TYPE_VALUE = 'QURY' GROUP BY DATEADD(MINUTE, ROUND(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, 0, DTL.START_TIME) / 1.0,0) * 1,0) ORDER BY START_TIME

DECLARE @QUERY_THRESHOLD int; SELECT TOP 1 @QUERY_THRESHOLD = QUERY_LIMIT FROM SGS_ACT_LOG; WITH ACTN_DETAILS AS ( SELECT TOP 50 ACTN.SOURCE, (SELECT TOP 1 INNER_DTL.DTL_NAME FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_DTL INNER_DTL WHERE INNER_DTL.DTL_ID = DTL.DTL_REF_ID AND INNER_DTL.DTL_TYPE_VALUE <> 'QURY') AS DETAIL_NAME, (DTL.TIME_IN_MS) TIME_IN_MS FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN ACTN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_DTL DTL WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACTN.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID = DTL.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID WHERE ACTN.SOURCE IS NOT NULL AND DTL.DTL_TYPE_VALUE = 'QURY' AND --DTL.DTL_NAME IS NOT NULL AND DTL.START_TIME BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME AND DTL.TIME_IN_MS > @QUERY_THRESHOLD )
SELECT SOURCE, DETAIL_NAME, MAX(TIME_IN_MS) MAX_TIME_IN_MS,@START_TIME AS START_TIME, @END_TIME AS END_TIME FROM ACTN_DETAILS GROUP BY SOURCE, DETAIL_NAME ORDER BY MAX_TIME_IN_MS DESC

SELECT ACTN.APPSERVER_NAME AS SERVER_NAME, SUM(CASE WHEN DTL.STATUS_VALUE = 'ERR' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ERROR_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN DTL.STATUS_VALUE = 'SLOW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SLOW_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN DTL.STATUS_VALUE = 'VSLO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS VERY_SLOW_COUNT, @START_TIME AS START_TIME , @END_TIME AS END_TIME FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN ACTN with(nolock) INNER JOIN SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_DTL DTL with(nolock) ON ACTN.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID = DTL.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID WHERE APPSERVER_NAME IS NOT NULL AND DTL.STATUS_VALUE IN ('ERR', 'SLOW', 'VSLO') AND DTL.START_TIME BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME GROUP BY APPSERVER_NAME

SELECT ACTN.WEB_SERVER_NAME AS SERVER_NAME, SUM(CASE WHEN ACTN.STATUS_VALUE = 'ERR' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ERROR_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN ACTN.STATUS_VALUE = 'SLOW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SLOW_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN ACTN.STATUS_VALUE = 'VSLO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS VERY_SLOW_COUNT, @START_TIME AS START_TIME, @END_TIME AS END_TIME FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN ACTN with(nolock) WHERE ACTN.WEB_SERVER_NAME IS NOT NULL AND ACTN.STATUS_VALUE IN ('ERR', 'SLOW', 'VSLO') AND ACTN.START_TIME BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME GROUP BY WEB_SERVER_NAME

DECLARE @QUERY_THRESHOLD int; SELECT TOP 1 @QUERY_THRESHOLD = QUERY_LIMIT FROM SGS_ACT_LOG WITH(NOLOCK); SELECT TOP 50 SOURCE, DTL_NAME, MAX(APP_TIME) APP_TIME,@START_TIME AS START_TIME, @END_TIME AS END_TIME FROM (SELECT ACTN.SOURCE, DTL.DTL_NAME,
(DTL.TIME_IN_MS - (SELECT SUM(ISNULL(TIME_IN_MS, 0)) FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_DTL INNER_DTL WHERE INNER_DTL.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID = DTL.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID AND INNER_DTL.DTL_REF_ID = DTL.DTL_ID AND INNER_DTL.DTL_TYPE_VALUE = 'QURY')) APP_TIME FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN ACTN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_DTL DTL WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACTN.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID = DTL.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID WHERE SOURCE IS NOT NULL AND DTL.DTL_TYPE_VALUE <> 'QURY' AND DTL.TIME_IN_MS IS NOT NULL AND DTL.START_TIME BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME) AST GROUP BY SOURCE,DTL_NAME HAVING MAX(APP_TIME) > @QUERY_THRESHOLD ORDER BY APP_TIME desc

SELECT COMMAND_TEXT.TEXT AS CURRENTQUERYTEXT, BLOCKEDBYTEXT.TEXT AS BLOCKEDTEXT, BLOCKEDBYTEXT.STATUS AS BLOCKEDSTATUS , * FROM SYS.SYSPROCESSES SP CROSS APPLY SYS.DM_EXEC_SQL_TEXT(SP.SQL_HANDLE) AS COMMAND_TEXT OUTER APPLY ( SELECT BLOCKEDTEXT.TEXT, BLOCKED.STATUS FROM SYS.SYSPROCESSES BLOCKED OUTER APPLY SYS.DM_EXEC_SQL_TEXT(BLOCKED.SQL_HANDLE) BLOCKEDTEXT WHERE BLOCKED.SPID = SP.BLOCKED AND SP.BLOCKED > 0 ) BLOCKEDBYTEXT WHERE SP.SPID> 50 AND SP.DBID>0 AND SP.DBID = DB_ID()

DECLARE @LAST_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE() - 30 SELECT TOP 50 DTL_NAME, QUERY.QUERY, COUNT(INST_ACTN_DTL_ID) COUNT FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_DTL DTL WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGS_UNIQUE_QUERY QUERY WITH(NOLOCK) ON DTL.UNIQUE_QUERY_ID = QUERY.UNIQUE_QUERY_ID WHERE START_TIME > @LAST_DATE AND DTL_TYPE_VALUE = 'QURY' GROUP BY DTL.DTL_NAME, QUERY.QUERY ORDER BY COUNT DESC

SELECT WAIT_STATS.WAIT_TYPE, WAIT_TIME_MS, MAX_WAIT_TIME_MS, ROUND(CAST(WAIT_TIME_MS AS FLOAT)/ WAITING_TASKS_COUNT,2) AVG_WAIT_TIME_MS FROM SYS.DM_OS_WAIT_STATS WAIT_STATS WHERE (WAIT_STATS.WAIT_TYPE IN ('CXPACKET', 'RESOURCE_SEMAPHORE', 'SOS_SCHEDULER_YIELD', 'WRITELOG', 'ASYNC_NETWORK_IO') OR WAIT_STATS.WAIT_TYPE IN ('LCK_M_SCH_S', 'LCK_M_SCH_M', 'LCK_M_S', 'LCK_M_U', 'LCK_M_X', 'LCK_M_IS', 'LCK_M_IU', 'LCK_M_IX') OR WAIT_STATS.WAIT_TYPE LIKE 'PAGEIOLATCH%') AND WAIT_TIME_MS > 0
DECLARE @DB_NAME VARCHAR(20) = (SELECT DB_NAME()) EXEC DBO.SGP_GETTABLEROWCOUNTS @DB_NAME
EXEC SGP_VALIDATE_TABLE_CONSTRAINTS
DECLARE @DB_NAME VARCHAR(20) = (SELECT DB_NAME()) EXEC DBO.SGP_GETINDEXINFO @DB_NAME

;WITH CTE_COLUMNS AS( SELECT COLUMN_DATA_COLS.name 'column_name', INDEX_DATA_COLS.object_id, INDEX_DATA_COLS.index_id, INDEX_COLUMN_DATA_COLS.is_included_column, INDEX_COLUMN_DATA_COLS.is_descending_key FROM sys.tables AS T INNER JOIN sys.indexes INDEX_DATA_COLS ON T.object_id = INDEX_DATA_COLS.object_id INNER JOIN sys.index_columns INDEX_COLUMN_DATA_COLS ON INDEX_DATA_COLS.object_id = INDEX_COLUMN_DATA_COLS.object_id AND INDEX_DATA_COLS.index_id = INDEX_COLUMN_DATA_COLS.index_id INNER JOIN sys.columns COLUMN_DATA_COLS ON T.object_id = COLUMN_DATA_COLS.object_id AND INDEX_COLUMN_DATA_COLS.column_id = COLUMN_DATA_COLS.column_id WHERE INDEX_COLUMN_DATA_COLS.is_included_column IN (0, 1) ), CTE_INDEX_DATA AS( SELECT TABLE_DATA.name AS table_name, INDEX_DATA.name AS index_name, STUFF((SELECT ', ' + column_name + ' ' + CASE WHEN KEY_COLS.is_descending_key = 1 THEN 'DESC' ELSE 'ASC' END FROM CTE_COLUMNS KEY_COLS WHERE INDEX_DATA.object_id = KEY_COLS.object_id AND INDEX_DATA.index_id = KEY_COLS.index_id AND KEY_COLS.is_included_column = 0 FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS key_column_list , STUFF(( SELECT ', ' + column_name FROM CTE_COLUMNS INC_COLS WHERE INDEX_DATA.object_id = INC_COLS.object_id AND INDEX_DATA.index_id = INC_COLS.index_id AND INC_COLS.is_included_column = 1 FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS include_column_list, INDEX_DATA.is_disabled FROM sys.indexes INDEX_DATA INNER JOIN sys.tables TABLE_DATA ON TABLE_DATA.object_id = INDEX_DATA.object_id INNER JOIN sys.schemas SCHEMA_DATA ON SCHEMA_DATA.schema_id = TABLE_DATA.schema_id WHERE TABLE_DATA.is_ms_shipped = 0 AND TABLE_DATA.name like 'SG%' AND INDEX_DATA.type_desc IN ('NONCLUSTERED', 'CLUSTERED')) SELECT * FROM CTE_INDEX_DATA DUPE1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM CTE_INDEX_DATA DUPE2 WHERE DUPE1.table_name = DUPE2.table_name AND (DUPE1.key_column_list LIKE LEFT(DUPE2.key_column_list, LEN(DUPE1.key_column_list)) OR DUPE2.key_column_list LIKE LEFT(DUPE1.key_column_list, LEN(DUPE2.key_column_list))) AND DUPE1.index_name <> DUPE2.index_name)
EXEC DBO.SGP_CHECKTEMPDBFILES

SELECT WAIT_STATS.WAIT_TYPE, WAITING_TASKS_COUNT FROM SYS.DM_OS_WAIT_STATS WAIT_STATS WHERE (WAIT_STATS.WAIT_TYPE IN ('CXPACKET', 'RESOURCE_SEMAPHORE', 'SOS_SCHEDULER_YIELD', 'WRITELOG', 'ASYNC_NETWORK_IO') OR WAIT_STATS.WAIT_TYPE IN ('LCK_M_SCH_S', 'LCK_M_SCH_M', 'LCK_M_S', 'LCK_M_U', 'LCK_M_X', 'LCK_M_IS', 'LCK_M_IU', 'LCK_M_IX') OR WAIT_STATS.WAIT_TYPE LIKE 'PAGEIOLATCH%') AND WAIT_TIME_MS > 0

SELECT BACKUPSET.BACKUP_SET_ID, BACKUPSET.NAME AS BACKUPSET_NAME, CASE BACKUPSET.TYPE WHEN 'D' THEN 'DATABASE' WHEN 'L' THEN 'LOG' END AS BACKUP_TYPE, ROUND(CAST(BACKUPSET.BACKUP_SIZE AS FLOAT)/ 1000000, 2) BACKUP_SIZE_IN_MB, CASE BACKUPMEDIAFAMILY.DEVICE_TYPE WHEN 2 THEN 'DISK' WHEN 5 THEN 'TAPE' WHEN 7 THEN 'VIRTUAL DEVICE' WHEN 9 THEN 'AZURE STORAGE' WHEN 105 THEN 'A PERMANENT BACKUP DEVICE' END AS DEVICE_TYPE, BACKUPSET.BACKUP_START_DATE, DATEPART(SECOND, BACKUPSET.BACKUP_FINISH_DATE - BACKUPSET.BACKUP_START_DATE) TIME_REQUIRED_IN_SECONDS, BACKUPMEDIAFAMILY.PHYSICAL_DEVICE_NAME FROM MSDB.DBO.BACKUPMEDIAFAMILY BACKUPMEDIAFAMILY INNER JOIN MSDB.DBO.BACKUPSET BACKUPSET ON BACKUPMEDIAFAMILY.MEDIA_SET_ID = BACKUPSET.MEDIA_SET_ID WHERE BACKUPSET.DATABASE_NAME = DB_NAME() AND BACKUPSET.BACKUP_START_DATE >= GETDATE() - 7 ORDER BY BACKUPSET.BACKUP_FINISH_DATE DESC

SELECT MSDB.DBO.BACKUPSET.DATABASE_NAME, MAX(MSDB.DBO.BACKUPSET.BACKUP_FINISH_DATE) AS LAST_DB_BACKUP_DATE, DATEDIFF(HH,MAX(MSDB.DBO.BACKUPSET.BACKUP_FINISH_DATE),GETDATE()) AS [BACKUP AGE (HOURS)], CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(HH,MAX(MSDB.DBO.BACKUPSET.BACKUP_FINISH_DATE),GETDATE()) >= 24 THEN 'OUTDATED' ELSE 'BACKED UP' END BACKUP_STATUS FROM MSDB.DBO.BACKUPSET WHERE MSDB.DBO.BACKUPSET.TYPE = 'D' AND MSDB.DBO.BACKUPSET.DATABASE_NAME = DB_NAME() GROUP BY MSDB.DBO.BACKUPSET.DATABASE_NAME

WITH TEMP (NAME,FILENAME,GROWTH,USAGE) AS( SELECT NAME, FILENAME, 'GROWTH' = (CASE STATUS & 0X100000 WHEN 0X100000 THEN CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), GROWTH) + N'%' ELSE CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), CONVERT (BIGINT, GROWTH) * 8) + N'KB' END), 'USAGE' = (CASE STATUS & 0X40 WHEN 0X40 THEN 'log only' ELSE 'data only' END) FROM SYSFILES WITH(NOLOCK))
SELECT TEMP.NAME,TEMP.filename,TEMP.growth,TEMP.usage, CASE WHEN TEMP.growth = '1024KB' AND Temp.usage = 'data only' THEN 'Change default setting/Adjust database growth to your weekly DB growth size.' WHEN TEMP.growth = '10%' AND Temp.usage = 'log only' THEN 'Change default Settings/ % Type growth is not recommended.' WHEN RIGHT(TEMP.growth,1) = '%' THEN '% Type growth is not recommended.' ELSE '' END AS [AutoGrowthRecommendation] FROM Temp WHERE (Temp.usage = 'data only' AND Temp.growth = '1024KB') OR (Temp.usage = 'log only' AND Temp.growth = '10%') ORDER BY Temp.NAME
EXEC SGP_GetAutogrowthEventDetails 2

SELECT ACTN.WEB_SERVER_NAME AS SERVER_NAME, COUNT(ACTN.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID) AS REQUEST_COUNT, ISNULL(CAST(SUM(CAST(TIME_IN_MS AS DECIMAL(10,0))/1000)/COUNT_BIG(ACTN.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID) AS DECIMAL(10,2)),0.0) AS AVERAGE_RESPONSE_TIME, MAX(ACTN.START_TIME) AS LAST_REQUEST, MIN(ACTN.START_TIME) AS FIRST_REQUEST, SUM(CASE WHEN ACTN.STATUS_VALUE = 'ERR' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ERROR_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN ACTN.STATUS_VALUE = 'SLOW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SLOW_COUNT, ROUND(CAST(COUNT(ACTN.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID) AS FLOAT) / CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(MINUTE, MIN(ACTN.START_TIME), MAX(ACTN.START_TIME)) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE DATEDIFF(MINUTE, MIN(ACTN.START_TIME), MAX(ACTN.START_TIME)) END, 2) AS THROUGHPUT, @start_time AS START_TIME, @end_time AS END_TIME FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN ACTN with(nolock) WHERE ACTN.START_TIME BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time AND ACTN.WEB_SERVER_NAME IS NOT NULL GROUP BY WEB_SERVER_NAME ORDER BY LAST_REQUEST DESC
query.sfwOracle: SELECT web_server_name ServerName, count(*) RequestCount, round(sum(time_in_ms) / count(*),2) AverageResponseTime, max(start_time) LastRequest, min(start_time) FirstRequest, sum(case when error_flag = 'y' then 1 else 0 end) ErrorCount, sum(case when time_in_ms > transaction_limit then 1 else 0 end) SlowCount, ROUND(cast(count(*) as float) / case when (( max(start_time)- min(start_time))*24*60) = 0 then 1 else ((max(start_time) - min(start_time))*24*60) end, 2) Throughput ,@start_time as Start_time , @end_time as End_time FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn, sgs_act_log WHERE web_server_name is not null AND start_time between @start_time AND @end_time GROUP BY web_server_name ORDER BY 4 desc

query.sfwSql: SELECT ACTN.APPSERVER_NAME AS SERVER_NAME, COUNT(INST_ACTN_DTL_ID) AS REQUEST_COUNT, ISNULL(CAST(SUM(CAST(DTL.TIME_IN_MS AS DECIMAL(10,0))/1000)/COUNT_BIG(INST_ACTN_DTL_ID) AS DECIMAL(10,2)),0.0) AS AVERAGE_RESPONSE_TIME, MAX(DTL.START_TIME) AS LAST_REQUEST, MIN(DTL.START_TIME) AS FIRST_REQUEST, SUM(CASE WHEN DTL.STATUS_VALUE = 'ERR' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ERROR_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN DTL.STATUS_VALUE = 'SLOW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SLOW_COUNT, ROUND(CAST(COUNT(INST_ACTN_DTL_ID) AS FLOAT) / CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(MINUTE, MIN(DTL.START_TIME), MAX(DTL.START_TIME)) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE DATEDIFF(MINUTE, MIN(DTL.START_TIME), MAX(DTL.START_TIME)) END, 2) AS THROUGHPUT, @start_time AS START_TIME , @end_time AS END_TIME FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN ACTN with(nolock) INNER JOIN SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_DTL DTL with(nolock) ON ACTN.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID = DTL.ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN_ID WHERE APPSERVER_NAME IS NOT NULL AND DTL.START_TIME BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time GROUP BY APPSERVER_NAME ORDER BY LAST_REQUEST desc
query.sfwOracle: SELECT appserver_name ServerName, count(*) RequestCount, Round(sum(time_in_ms) / count(*)) AverageResponseTime, max(start_time) LastRequest, min(start_time) FirstRequest, sum(case when error_message is null then 0 else 1 end) ErrorCount, sum(case when time_in_ms > appserver_limit then 1 else 0 end) SlowCount, round(cast(count(*) as binary_double) / case when (max(start_time) - min(start_time)) * 1440 = 0 then 1 else (max(start_time) - min(start_time)) * 1440 end, 2) Throughput, @start_time Start_time , @end_time End_time FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn_step , sgs_act_log WHERE appserver_name is not null AND start_time between @start_time AND @end_time GROUP BY appserver_name ORDER BY 4 desc

query.sfwSql: select * from (select count(*) ActiveSession from sys.sysprocesses where DB_NAME(dbid) = 'NeoBase_Dev_IT2'and spid> 52 and dbid>0 and len(hostname) > 0) as T1 , (select (mem.available_physical_memory_kb/(mem.total_physical_memory_kb*1.0)*100) Per_MemoryFree , (mem.total_physical_memory_kb/1024) AS TotalAvailableMemory from sys.dm_os_sys_memory mem ) as t2, (select count(*) as ActiveRequests from sys.dm_exec_requests where session_id > 50 and status <> 'background' and status = 'running') as t3
query.sfwOracle: select * from (Select count(*) ActiveSession From V$session), (select min(value)/1024/1024 Per_MemoryFree from dba_hist_osstat where stat_name ='FREE_MEMORY_BYTES'), (select max(value)/1024/1024 TotalAvailableMemory from dba_hist_osstat where stat_name = 'PHYSICAL_MEMORY_BYTES'), (select count(*) ActiveRequests from v$Session where sid >50 and status='ACTIVE' and service_name='SYS$BACKGROUND')

query.sfwSql: DECLARE @DB_NAME VARCHAR(20) = (SELECT DB_NAME()) EXEC DBO.SGP_GETDBMISSINGINDEX @DB_NAME

select count(*) ItemProcessed , inst.ENGINE_NAME , @start_time as 'Start_time' , @end_time as 'End_time' from SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE inst with(nolock) inner join SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN act with(nolock) on inst.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID = act.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID where inst.START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time group by inst.ENGINE_NAME
query.sfwOracle: select count(*) ItemProcessed , inst.ENGINE_NAME , @start_time as Start_time , @end_time as End_time from SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE inst inner join SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN act on inst.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID = act.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID where inst.START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time group by inst.ENGINE_NAME

query.sfwSql: SELECT available_physical_memory_kb/1024 as "Total Memory MB", available_physical_memory_kb/(total_physical_memory_kb*1.0)*100 AS "% Memory Free" FROM sys.dm_os_sys_memory
query.sfwOracle: select * from (select max(value)/1024/1024 "Total Memory MB" from dba_hist_osstat where stat_name = 'PHYSICAL_MEMORY_BYTES'), (select min(value)/1024/1024 "% Memory Free" from dba_hist_osstat where stat_name ='FREE_MEMORY_BYTES')

query.sfwSql: SELECT DISTINCT volume_mount_point [Disk Mount Point], CONVERT(DECIMAL(18,2),total_bytes/1073741824.0) AS [Total Size in GB], ---1GB = 1073741824 bytes CONVERT(DECIMAL(18,2),available_bytes/1073741824.0) AS [Available Size in GB], CAST(CAST(available_bytes AS FLOAT)/ CAST(total_bytes AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(18,2)) * 100 AS [Space Free %] FROM sys.master_files CROSS APPLY sys.dm_os_volume_stats(database_id, file_id)

SELECT db.[name] AS [DatabaseName] ,id.[object_id] AS [ObjectID] ,OBJECT_NAME(id.[object_id], db.[database_id]) AS [ObjectName] ,id.[statement] AS [FullyQualifiedObjectName] ,id.[equality_columns] AS [EqualityColumns] ,id.[inequality_columns] AS [InEqualityColumns] ,id.[included_columns] AS [IncludedColumns] ,gs.[unique_compiles] AS [UniqueCompiles] ,gs.[user_seeks] AS [UserSeeks] ,gs.[user_scans] AS [UserScans] ,gs.[last_user_seek] AS [LastUserSeekTime] ,gs.[last_user_scan] AS [LastUserScanTime] ,gs.[avg_total_user_cost] AS [AvgTotalUserCost] -- Average cost of the user queries that could be reduced by the index in the group. ,gs.[avg_user_impact] AS [AvgUserImpact] -- The value means that the query cost would on average drop by this percentage if this missing index group was implemented. ,gs.[system_seeks] AS [SystemSeeks] ,gs.[system_scans] AS [SystemScans] ,gs.[last_system_seek] AS [LastSystemSeekTime] ,gs.[last_system_scan] AS [LastSystemScanTime] ,gs.[avg_total_system_cost] AS [AvgTotalSystemCost] ,gs.[avg_system_impact] AS [AvgSystemImpact] -- Average percentage benefit that system queries could experience if this missing index group was implemented. ,gs.[user_seeks] * gs.[avg_total_user_cost] * (gs.[avg_user_impact] * 0.01) AS [IndexAdvantage] ,'CREATE INDEX [IX_' + OBJECT_NAME(id.[object_id], db.[database_id]) + '_' + REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ISNULL(id.[equality_columns], ''), ', ', '_'), '[', ''), ']', '') + CASE WHEN id.[equality_columns] IS NOT NULL AND id.[inequality_columns] IS NOT NULL THEN '_' ELSE '' END + REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ISNULL(id.[inequality_columns], ''), ', ', '_'), '[', ''), ']', '') + '_' + LEFT(CAST(NEWID() AS [nvarchar](64)), 5) + ']' + ' ON ' + id.[statement] + ' (' + ISNULL(id.[equality_columns], '') + CASE WHEN id.[equality_columns] IS NOT NULL AND id.[inequality_columns] IS NOT NULL THEN ',' ELSE '' END + ISNULL(id.[inequality_columns], '') + ')' + ISNULL(' INCLUDE (' + id.[included_columns] + ')', '') AS [ProposedIndex] ,CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS [smalldatetime]) AS [CollectionDate] FROM [sys].[dm_db_missing_index_group_stats] gs WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [sys].[dm_db_missing_index_groups] ig WITH (NOLOCK) ON gs.[group_handle] = ig.[index_group_handle] INNER JOIN [sys].[dm_db_missing_index_details] id WITH (NOLOCK) ON ig.[index_handle] = id.[index_handle] INNER JOIN [sys].[databases] db WITH (NOLOCK) ON db.[database_id] = id.[database_id] WHERE db.[database_id] = DB_ID() --AND OBJECT_NAME(id.[object_id], db.[database_id]) = 'YourTableName' ORDER BY ObjectName, [AvgUserImpact] desc OPTION (RECOMPILE);
select * from sys.sysprocesses where DB_NAME(dbid) = 'NeoBase_Dev_IT2'and spid> 50 and dbid>0 and len(hostname) > 0
query.sfwOracle: select * from v$Session where sid >50

query.sfwSql: SELECT r.session_id,r.start_time,r.status,r.command ,t.* FROM sys.dm_exec_requests AS r CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(r.sql_handle) AS t
query.sfwOracle: select sid,status,command,SQL.* from v$Session CROSS APPLY V$SQLtext SQL;

query.sfwSql: DECLARE @DB_NAME VARCHAR(20) = (SELECT DB_NAME()) EXEC DBO.SGP_GETALLDBCPUTIME @DB_NAME
query.sfwOracle: select SUBSTR(SqlMonitor.SQL_TEXT,stat.STARTS),stat.EXECUTIONS execution_count,SqlMonitor.DISK_READS logical_reads,stat.LAST_DISK_READS last_logical_read ,stat.DISK_WRITES logical_write,stat.LAST_DISK_WRITES last_logical_writes, SqlMonitor.CPU_TIME total_worker_time,stat.ELAPSED_TIME total_elapsed_time_in_S, stat.LAST_ELAPSED_TIME last_elapsed_time_in_S,SqlMonitor.LAST_REFRESH_TIME last_execution_time from V$SQL_PLAN_STATISTICS stat cross apply V$SQL_MONITOR SqlMonitor order by SqlMonitor.CPU_TIME DESC

query.sfwSql: DECLARE @DB_NAME VARCHAR(20) = (SELECT DB_NAME()) EXEC DBO.SGP_GETALLDBLOGICALREADS @DB_NAME
query.sfwOracle: select SUBSTR(SqlMonitor.SQL_TEXT,stat.STARTS),stat.EXECUTIONS execution_count,SqlMonitor.DISK_READS logical_reads,stat.LAST_DISK_READS last_logical_read ,stat.DISK_WRITES logical_write,stat.LAST_DISK_WRITES last_logical_writes, SqlMonitor.CPU_TIME total_worker_time,stat.ELAPSED_TIME total_elapsed_time_in_S, stat.LAST_ELAPSED_TIME last_elapsed_time_in_S,SqlMonitor.LAST_REFRESH_TIME last_execution_time from V$SQL_PLAN_STATISTICS stat cross apply V$SQL_MONITOR SqlMonitor order by SqlMonitor.DISK_READS DESC

query.sfwSql: DECLARE @DB_NAME VARCHAR(20) = (SELECT DB_NAME()) EXEC DBO.SGP_GETALLDBLOGICALWRITES @DB_NAME
query.sfwOracle: select SUBSTR(SqlMonitor.SQL_TEXT,stat.STARTS),stat.EXECUTIONS execution_count,SqlMonitor.DISK_READS logical_reads,stat.LAST_DISK_READS last_logical_read ,stat.DISK_WRITES logical_write,stat.LAST_DISK_WRITES last_logical_writes, SqlMonitor.CPU_TIME total_worker_time,stat.ELAPSED_TIME total_elapsed_time_in_S, stat.LAST_ELAPSED_TIME last_elapsed_time_in_S,SqlMonitor.LAST_REFRESH_TIME last_execution_time from V$SQL_PLAN_STATISTICS stat cross apply V$SQL_MONITOR SqlMonitor order by stat.DISK_WRITES DESC

query.sfwSql: DECLARE @DATE DATE,@END_TIME DATE,@START_TIME DATE; SET @DATE=(SELECT MAX(BACKUP_START_DATE) FROM MSDB.DBO.BACKUPSET WITH(NOLOCK)); SET @END_TIME= DATEADD(DAY,-DAY(@DATE)+1,@DATE) ; SET @START_TIME= DATEADD(MONTH,-11,@END_TIME); WITH CTE AS ( SELECT MONTH([BACKUP_START_DATE]) AS "MONTH", YEAR([BACKUP_START_DATE]) AS "YEAR", AVG([BACKUP_SIZE]/1024/1024) AS "BACKUPSIZEMB", AVG([COMPRESSED_BACKUP_SIZE]/1024/1024) AS "COMPRESSED BACKUP SIZE MB", AVG([BACKUP_SIZE]/[COMPRESSED_BACKUP_SIZE]) AS "COMPRESSION RATIO" FROM MSDB.DBO.BACKUPSET WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE DATABASE_NAME = DB_NAME() AND BACKUP_START_DATE BETWEEN @START_TIME AND DATEADD(MONTH,+1,@END_TIME) GROUP BY MONTH([BACKUP_START_DATE]) , YEAR([BACKUP_START_DATE]) ) SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(3),DATENAME(MONTH,CAST((CAST([YEAR] AS CHAR(4)) + '-' + CAST([MONTH] AS CHAR(2)) + '-' +'01') AS CHAR(10)))) + ' - ' + CAST(YEAR AS CHAR(4)) AS "MONTH", YEAR, BACKUPSIZEMB, [COMPRESSED BACKUP SIZE MB], [COMPRESSION RATIO] FROM CTE ORDER BY YEAR

declare @transaction_limit int select @transaction_limit= transaction_limit from sgs_act_log; select inst.ACTOR_NAME , count(*) as RequestCount, sum(time_in_ms) / count(*) AverageResponseTime, max(act.start_time) LastRequest, min(act.start_time) FirstRequest, sum(case when error_flag = 'y' then 1 else 0 end) ErrorCount, sum(case when time_in_ms > @transaction_limit then 1 else 0 end) SlowCount, round(cast(count(*) as float) / case when DateDiff(MINUTE, min(act.start_time), max(act.start_time)) = 0 then 1 else DateDiff(MINUTE, min(act.start_time), max(act.start_time)) end, 2) Throughput ,@start_time as 'Start_time' , @end_time as 'End_time' from SGS_ACT_LOG_INST inst inner join SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN act on inst.ACT_LOG_INST_ID = act.ACT_LOG_INST_ID where act.start_time between @start_time AND @end_time and len(ACTOR_NAME ) > 0 group by inst.ACTOR_NAME
query.sfwOracle: SELECT INST.ACTOR_NAME, COUNT(*) REQUESTCOUNT , SUM(TIME_IN_MS) / COUNT(*) AVERAGERESPONSETIME , MAX(ACT.START_TIME) LASTREQUEST, MIN(ACT.START_TIME) FIRSTREQUEST, SUM(CASE WHEN ERROR_FLAG = 'y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ERRORCOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN TIME_IN_MS > (SELECT transaction_limit FROM sgs_act_log WHERE ROWNUM = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SLOWCOUNT, ROUND(CAST(COUNT(*) AS BINARY_DOUBLE) / CASE WHEN (MAX(ACT.START_TIME) - MIN(ACT.START_TIME)) * 1440 = 0 THEN 1 ELSE (MAX(ACT.START_TIME) - MIN(ACT.START_TIME)) * 1440 END, 2) THROUGHPUT ,SYSDATE-2 AS START_TIME , SYSDATE AS END_TIME FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST INST INNER JOIN SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN ACT ON INST.ACT_LOG_INST_ID = ACT.ACT_LOG_INST_ID WHERE ACT.START_TIME BETWEEN SYSDATE-2 AND SYSDATE AND LENGTH(RTRIM(ACTOR_NAME )) > 0 GROUP BY INST.ACTOR_NAME

query.sfwSql: SELECT web_server_name ServerName, count(*) RequestCount, sum(time_in_ms) / count(*) AverageResponseTime, max(start_time) LastRequest, min(start_time) FirstRequest, sum(case when error_flag = 'y' then 1 else 0 end) ErrorCount, sum(case when time_in_ms > transaction_limit then 1 else 0 end) SlowCount, round(cast(count(*) as float) / case when DateDiff(MINUTE, min(start_time), max(start_time)) = 0 then 1 else DateDiff(MINUTE, min(start_time), max(start_time)) end, 2) Throughput FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn, sgs_act_log WHERE web_server_name is not null AND start_time between @start_time AND @end_time GROUP BY web_server_name ORDER BY 4 desc
query.sfwOracle: SELECT web_server_name ServerName, count(*) RequestCount, round(sum(time_in_ms) / count(*),2) AverageResponseTime, max(start_time) LastRequest, min(start_time) FirstRequest, sum(case when error_flag = 'y' then 1 else 0 end) ErrorCount, sum(case when time_in_ms > transaction_limit then 1 else 0 end) SlowCount, ROUND(cast(count(*) as float) / case when ((max(start_time)-min(start_time))*24*60) = 0 then 1 else ((max(start_time)-min(start_time))*24*60) end, 2) Throughput FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn, sgs_act_log WHERE web_server_name is not null AND start_time between @start_time AND @end_time GROUP BY web_server_name ORDER BY 4 desc

query.sfwSql: select sum(time_in_ms) / count(*) ResponseTime, case when charindex('(', action_name) > 0 then left(action_name, charindex('(', action_name)-1) else action_name end + '.' + (case when isnull(action_target,'') = '' then action_source else action_target end) ActionName, max(time_in_ms) MaxResponseTime, count(*) Calls, round(cast(count(*) as float) / case when DateDiff(MINUTE, min(start_time), max(start_time)) = 0 then 1 else DateDiff(MINUTE, min(start_time), max(start_time)) end, 2) CallsPerMin, sum(case when error_flag = 'y' then 1 else 0 end) ErrorCount, sum(case when time_in_ms > b.TRANSACTION_HIGH_LIMIT then 1 else 0 end) SlowCount from sgs_act_log_inst_actn, sgs_act_log b where web_server_name is not null and start_time between @start_time and @end_time group by case when charindex('(', action_name) > 0 then left(action_name, charindex('(', action_name)-1) else action_name end + '.' + (case when isnull(action_target,'') = '' then action_source else action_target end) order by max(time_in_ms) desc
query.sfwOracle: select Round(sum(time_in_ms) / count(*),2) ResponseTime, case when instr(action_name,'(') > 0 then COALESCE(substr(action_name, 0,case when instr(action_name,'(') =0 then instr(action_name,'(') else instr(action_name,'(')-1 end),'') else action_name end || '.' || (case when COALESCE(action_target,'null') = 'null' then action_source else action_target end) ActionName, max(time_in_ms) MaxResponseTime, count(*) Calls, Round(cast(count(*) as float) / case when ((max(start_time)- min(start_time))*24*60) = 0 then 1 else ((max(start_time) - min(start_time))*24*60) end, 2) CallsPerMin, sum(case when error_flag = 'y' then 1 else 0 end) ErrorCount, sum(case when time_in_ms > b.TRANSACTION_HIGH_LIMIT then 1 else 0 end) SlowCount from sgs_act_log_inst_actn, sgs_act_log b where web_server_name is not null and start_time between @start_time AND @end_time group by case when instr(action_name,'(') > 0 then COALESCE(substr(action_name, 0,case when instr(action_name,'(') =0 then instr(action_name,'(') else instr(action_name,'(')-1 end),'') else action_name end || '.' || (case when COALESCE(action_target,'null') = 'null' then action_source else action_target end) order by max(time_in_ms) desc

query.sfwSql: select query, query_hash QueryHash, count(*) Calls, sum(time_in_ms) / count(*) ResponseTime, max(time_in_ms) MaxTime, sum(case when time_in_ms > b.QUERY_LIMIT then 1 else 0 end) SlowCount from sgv_database_transaction a, sgs_act_log b where start_time between @start_time and @end_time group by query, query_hash order by max(time_in_ms) desc;
query.sfwOracle: select to_char(query), query_hash QueryHash, count(*) Calls, cast(sum(time_in_ms) / count(*)as DECIMAL(30,2)) ResponseTime, max(time_in_ms) MaxTime, sum(case when time_in_ms > b.QUERY_LIMIT then 1 else 0 end) SlowCount from sgv_database_transaction a, sgs_act_log b where start_time between @start_time and @end_time group by to_char(query), query_hash order by max(time_in_ms) desc

query.sfwSql:
SELECT
count(*) NoOfRecords , 'RequestCount' as Type ,@start_time as 'startDate',@end_time as 'endDate' FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn with(nolock), sgs_act_log with(nolock) WHERE WEB_SERVER_NAME is not null AND start_time between @start_time AND @end_time union all SELECT sum(case when ERROR_FLAG is null then 0 else 1 end) NoOfRecords , 'ErrorCount' ,@start_time as 'startDate',@end_time as 'endDate' FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN with(nolock), sgs_act_log with(nolock) WHERE WEB_SERVER_NAME is not null AND start_time between @start_time AND @end_time
union all SELECT
sum(case when time_in_ms > TRANSACTION_LIMIT then 1 else 0 end) NoOfRecords ,'SlowCount' ,@start_time,@end_time FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn with(nolock), sgs_act_log with(nolock) WHERE WEB_SERVER_NAME is not null AND start_time between @start_time AND @end_time
query.sfwOracle:
SELECT
count(*) NoOfRecords , 'RequestCount' as Type ,@start_time as startDate,@end_time as endDate FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn, sgs_act_log WHERE WEB_SERVER_NAME is not null AND start_time between @start_time AND @end_time union all SELECT sum(case when ERROR_FLAG is null then 0 else 1 end) NoOfRecords , 'ErrorCount' ,@start_time as startDate,@end_time as endDate FROM SGS_ACT_LOG_INST_ACTN , sgs_act_log WHERE WEB_SERVER_NAME is not null AND start_time between @start_time AND @end_time
union all SELECT
sum(case when time_in_ms > TRANSACTION_LIMIT then 1 else 0 end) NoOfRecords ,'SlowCount' ,@start_time,@end_time FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn , sgs_act_log WHERE WEB_SERVER_NAME is not null AND start_time between @start_time AND @end_time

query.sfwSql: select DATEPART(HOUR, START_TIME) Time, ACTION_TYPE , count(*) Count from SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN --where START_TIME between GETDATE() -1 and GETDATE() group by DATEPART(Hour, START_TIME) , ACTION_TYPE
query.sfwOracle: select TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'HOUR')) Time, ACTION_TYPE , count(*) Count from SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN group by TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'Hour')) , ACTION_TYPE;

query.sfwSql: select count(*) 'Count' , 'Allcount' as Type , @start_time as 'startDate' , @end_time as 'endDate' from sgs_job_detail where START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time union all select count(*) as 'Count' , 'MonitoredCount' as Type , @start_time as 'startDate' , @end_time as 'endDate' from sgs_job_detail jdt, sgs_job_header jhd, sgs_job_schedule jsc, sgs_job_schedule_detail jsd, sgs_act_log_job_step aljs where jdt.job_header_id = jhd.job_header_id and jhd.job_schedule_id = jsc.job_schedule_id and jsd.job_schedule_id = jhd.job_schedule_id and jsd.step_code = jdt.step_code and jsd.job_schedule_detail_id = aljs.job_schedule_detail_id and jdt.start_time between @start_time and @end_time union all select count(*) 'Count' , 'SlowCount' as Type , @start_time as 'startDate' , @end_time as 'endDate' from sgs_job_detail_th where START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time
query.sfwOracle: select count(*) "Count" , 'Allcount' as Type , @start_time as "startDate" , @end_time as "endDate" from sgs_job_detail where START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time union all select count(*) as "Count" , 'MonitoredCount' as Type , @start_time as "startDate" , @end_time as "endDate" from sgs_job_detail jdt, sgs_job_header jhd, sgs_job_schedule jsc, sgs_job_schedule_detail jsd, sgs_act_log_job_step aljs where jdt.job_header_id = jhd.job_header_id and jhd.job_schedule_id = jsc.job_schedule_id and jsd.job_schedule_id = jhd.job_schedule_id and jsd.step_code = jdt.step_code and jsd.job_schedule_detail_id = aljs.job_schedule_detail_id and jdt.start_time between @start_time and @end_time union all select count(*) "Count" , 'SlowCount' as Type , @start_time as "startDate" , @end_time as "endDate" from sgs_job_detail_th where START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time

query.sfwSql: SELECT count(*) RequestCount, ISNULL(sum(CONVERT(BIGINT, time_in_ms)) / count(*), 0) AverageResponseTime, max(start_time) LastRequest, min(start_time) FirstRequest, ISNULL(sum(case when error_flag = 'y' then 1 else 0 end),0) ErrorCount, ISNULL(sum(case when time_in_ms > transaction_limit then 1 else 0 end),0) SlowCount, round(Cast(count(*) AS int) / case when DateDiff(MINUTE, min(start_time), max(start_time)) = 0 then 1 else DateDiff(MINUTE, min(start_time), max(start_time)) end, 2) Throughput , @start_time as 'start_time' , @end_time as 'end_time' , count(distinct web_server_name) as WebServerCount FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn, sgs_act_log WHERE web_server_name is not null AND start_time between @start_time AND @end_time
query.sfwOracle: SELECT Count(*) RequestCount, COALESCE(Round(Sum(time_in_ms) / Count(*)),0) AverageResponseTime, Max(start_time) LastRequest, Min(start_time) FirstRequest, COALESCE(Sum(CASE WHEN error_message IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END),0) ErrorCount, COALESCE(Sum(CASE WHEN time_in_ms > appserver_limit THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) SlowCount, ROUND(cast(Count(*) as number(10,2)) / CASE WHEN ( Max(start_time) - Min(start_time) ) * 1440 = 0 THEN 1 ELSE ( Max(start_time) - Min(start_time) ) * 1440 END, 2) Throughput, @start_time start_time, @end_time end_time, Count(DISTINCT appserver_name) AS WebServerCount FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn_step, sgs_act_log WHERE appserver_name IS NOT NULL AND start_time BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time ORDER BY 4 DESC

query.sfwSql:
SELECT count(*) RequestCount, ISNULL(sum(time_in_ms) / count(*),0) AverageResponseTime, max(start_time) LastRequest, min(start_time) FirstRequest, ISNULL(sum(case when error_message is null then 0 else 1 end),0) ErrorCount, ISNULL(sum(case when time_in_ms > appserver_limit then 1 else 0 end),0) SlowCount, round(cast(count(*) as float) / case when DateDiff(MINUTE, min(start_time), max(start_time)) = 0 then 1 else DateDiff(MINUTE, min(start_time), max(start_time)) end, 2) Throughput, @start_time as 'start_time' , @end_time as 'end_time' , count(distinct appserver_name) as WebServerCount FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn_step with(nolock) , sgs_act_log with(nolock) WHERE appserver_name is not null AND start_time between @start_time AND @end_time
ORDER BY 4 desc
query.sfwOracle: SELECT Count(*) RequestCount, COALESCE(Round(Sum(time_in_ms) / Count(*)),0) AverageResponseTime, Max(start_time) LastRequest, Min(start_time) FirstRequest, COALESCE(Sum(CASE WHEN error_message IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END),0) ErrorCount, COALESCE(Sum(CASE WHEN time_in_ms > appserver_limit THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) SlowCount, ROUND(cast(Count(*) as number(10,2)) / CASE WHEN ( Max(start_time) - Min(start_time) ) * 1440 = 0 THEN 1 ELSE ( Max(start_time) - Min(start_time) ) * 1440 END, 2) Throughput, @start_time start_time, @end_time end_time, Count(DISTINCT appserver_name) AS WebServerCount FROM sgs_act_log_inst_actn_step, sgs_act_log WHERE appserver_name IS NOT NULL AND start_time BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time ORDER BY 4 DESC

query.sfwSql: select jd.status_id , jd.STATUS_VALUE, cv.DESCRIPTION, count(*) 'count' , @start_time as 'Start_time' , @end_time as 'End_time' from sgs_job_detail jd inner join SGS_CODE_VALUE cv on jd.STATUS_VALUE = cv.CODE_VALUE and jd.STATUS_ID = cv.CODE_ID where jd.START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time group by jd.status_id, jd.STATUS_VALUE,cv.DESCRIPTION
query.sfwOracle: SELECT jd.status_id, jd.status_value, cv.description, Count(*) count, @start_time Start_time, @end_time End_time FROM sgs_job_detail jd INNER JOIN sgs_code_value cv ON jd.status_value = cv.code_value AND jd.status_id = cv.code_id WHERE jd.start_time BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time GROUP BY jd.status_id, jd.status_value, cv.description

query.sfwSql:
select case when action_type = 'BpmRequestsHandler' then 'Request' when ACTION_TYPE ='Dequeue' then 'Queue' else action_type end as action_type , count(*) as NoOfItems , @start_time as 'Start_time' , @end_time as 'End_time' from SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN where START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time and action_type in ('BpmRequestsHandler','Dequeue') group by ACTION_TYPE
union all
select 'Error Count' as action_type, ISNULL( count(*) , 0) TotalException , @start_time as 'Start_time' , @end_time as 'End_time' from SGW_BPM_PROCESSING_ERROR where CREATED_DATE between @start_time and @end_time
query.sfwOracle: SELECT CASE WHEN action_type = 'BpmRequestsHandler' THEN 'Request' WHEN action_type = 'Dequeue' THEN 'Queue' ELSE action_type END action_type, Count(*) NoOfItems, @start_time Start_time, @end_time End_time FROM sgw_bpm_trace_inst_actn WHERE start_time BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time AND action_type IN ( 'BpmRequestsHandler', 'Dequeue' ) GROUP BY action_type UNION ALL SELECT 'Error Count' action_type, Nvl(Count(*), 0) TotalException, @start_time Start_time, @end_time End_time FROM sgw_bpm_processing_error WHERE created_date BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time

query.sfwSql: select count(*) ItemProcessed , inst.ENGINE_NAME , count(error.PROCESSING_ERROR_ID) as ErrorCount , @start_time as 'Start_time' , @end_time as 'End_time' from SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE inst with(nolock) inner join SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN act with(nolock) on inst.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID = act.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID inner join SGW_BPM_PROCESSING_ERROR error on act.TRANSACTION_ID = error.TRANSACTION_ID where inst.START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time group by inst.ENGINE_NAME
query.sfwOracle: select count(*) ItemProcessed , inst.ENGINE_NAME , count(error.PROCESSING_ERROR_ID) as ErrorCount , @start_time as Start_time , @end_time as End_time from SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE inst inner join SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN act on inst.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID = act.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID inner join SGW_BPM_PROCESSING_ERROR error on act.TRANSACTION_ID = error.TRANSACTION_ID where inst.START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time group by inst.ENGINE_NAME

query.sfwSql: select count(*) ItemProcessed , inst.ENGINE_NAME , round(cast(count(dtl.TRACE_INST_ACTN_DTL_ID) as float) / case when DateDiff(MINUTE, min(dtl.start_time), max(dtl.start_time)) = 0 then 1 else DateDiff(MINUTE, min(dtl.start_time), max(dtl.start_time)) end, 2) Throughput from SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE inst with(nolock) inner join SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN act with(nolock) on inst.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID = act.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID inner join SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN_DTL dtl on act.TRANSACTION_ID = dtl.TRANSACTION_ID where inst.START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time group by inst.ENGINE_NAME
query.sfwOracle: select count(*) ItemProcessed , inst.ENGINE_NAME , round(cast(count(dtl.TRACE_INST_ACTN_DTL_ID) as binary_double) / case when (max(dtl.start_time) - min(dtl.start_time)) * 1440 = 0 then 1 else (max(dtl.start_time) - min(dtl.start_time)) * 1440 end, 2) Throughput from SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE inst inner join SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN act on inst.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID = act.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID inner join SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN_DTL dtl on act.TRANSACTION_ID = dtl.TRANSACTION_ID where inst.START_TIME between @start_time and @end_time group by inst.ENGINE_NAME
